Event Description: SPURIOUS: Unplanned ESD-2 due to FGS voting trip
First Cause: 77ATFZLPG1-GD01 voting trip with NO gas detection
Issues and next steps:
Known issue due to wrong implementation of DCN during towing. 
planned download on Febraury 07 2026. 
Communication variables set to trip in case of bad/fault

Event Description: SPURIOUS: 76S-3000 total process shutdown unexpected, caused by Condensate Cargo tank level extremely high
Issues and next steps: the long term inhibition on the level transmitters due to instability of the readings, have been removed. sudden spikes (due to overrange) caused after 60 minutes activation of total process shutdown. CSU INST team to support troubleshooting with vendor

Event Description: GENUINE: ACtivated ESD, and total blackout after losing main power generation. PAGA activated as expected
First Cause: Low Low pressure on Instrument Air
Issues and next steps: Pressure on the IA  started to decrease from 16:55. after 20 minutes went below 4 barg and activated 76S-2000
